summary: A sweet Midwestern guy with his life planned out for himself is wooed, groomed, and ultimately dumped by a complicated, elusive gal.
cast: Elisha Cuthbert|Jesse Bradford|Austin Basis|Chris Sarandon|Jay Patterson|Tom Aldredge|Louis Mustillo|Brian Reddy|Stark Sands|Joanna Gleason|Cherene Snow|Kimberly Youngblood|Don Sparks|Sean Phillips|William Abadie|Kevin Kevin|Wayne Wilcox|Filippo Bozotti|Robert Stoeckle|Wade Allain-Marcus|Josh Cooke|Eliyas Qureshi|Brooke Tansley|Donna Vivino|Janne Olivia Campbell|Christine Danelson|Eunice Wong|Jessalyn Wanlim|Erin Stutland|Tiffany Perry|Kate Simses|Meredith Turley|Alanna Wilson|Debargo Sanyal|Ken Kensei|Richard Sheinmel|Jim Guarantano|Frances Mignano|Elizabeth Newman|Paul Thornton
title: My Sassy Girl
